channel.title: Table of Whonix releases and Debian versions they are based on
channel.description: Can we have a table of all Whonix versions (including the new incoming version that wasn't released yet) and the corresponding versions of Debian they are based on somewhere in the wiki? I did a couple of searches but could not find anything related, just some info about very old Whonix versions.

item.title: Table of Whonix releases and Debian versions they are based on
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
• Whonix 10 -> wheezy
  • Whonix 11 -> jessie

If you want a table, you are welcome to create one.

[html] This is a wiki. Want to improve this page? Help welcome, volunteer contributions are happily considered! See Conditions for Contributions to Whonix, then Edit! IP addresses are scrubbed, but editing over Tor is recommended. Edits are held for moderation. [/html]

Read full topic
